name: Be The Boss Fight (Beta)
description:
Welcome to Be The Boss!

This is a local multiplayer game where you and another friend in the room can fight against each other.

One of you being the OP boss, and the other being the player.

The player, must survive the boss fight until the dizzy cooldown is zero. Then the player can strike!

The boss, has to kill the player before the player takes advantage of the dizzy cooldown.

I need your feedback to know what to add next!

I will try to read all of your feedback, and if I can I will add in what you suggest!


Controls: Player:

Left and Right - Move

Up - Hover in air

Down - Slam down (Will deal damage on the boss if the boss is dizzy)

Boss:

W - Shoot Spike

S - Boost fowards in the current direction

D - Lure the player by generating a health box

A - Turn invisible (Speeds up the dizzy countdown)
